mapper.insert: insert into ahzit( ahzit_no, ahzit_leader, ahzit_sort, ahzit_name, ahzit_info, ahzit_region_high, ahzit_region_low, ahzit_ispublic) values(#{ahzitNo}, #{ahzitLeader}, #{ahzitSort}, #{ahzitName}, #{ahzitInfo}, #{ahzitRegionHigh}, #{ahzitRegionLow}, #{ahzitIsPublic})
mapper.update: update ahzit set ahzit_name=#{ahzitName}, ahzit_info=#{ahzitInfo}, ahzit_headmax=#{ahzitHeadMax}, ahzit_ispublic=#{ahzitIsPublic} where ahzit_no = #{ahzitNo}
